---

**Platform Information**
- **Platform name**: [e.g. Vimeo, Dailymotion, etc.]
- **Website**: [e.g. https://vimeo.com]
- **Type**: [e.g. Video sharing, Short videos, etc.]

**Example URLs**
Please provide example URLs that should be supported:
- [e.g. https://vimeo.com/123456789]
- [e.g. https://vimeo.com/channels/staffpicks/123456789]

**Technical Details**
- **API availability**: [Yes/No/Unknown]
- **Rate limits**: [If known]
- **Authentication required**: [Yes/No/Unknown]
- **Video formats**: [e.g. MP4, WebM, etc.]
- **Maximum video length**: [If known]
- **Maximum file size**: [If known]

**yt-dlp Support**
- [ ] Platform is supported by yt-dlp
- [ ] Platform is not supported by yt-dlp
- [ ] Unknown

**Additional Information**
Any other relevant information about the platform:
- Popularity/usage statistics
- Geographic availability
- Content types
- etc.

**Priority**
- [ ] Low (nice to have)
- [ ] Medium (would be useful)
- [ ] High (many users request this)
- [ ] Critical (essential platform)

**Testing**
If you can provide test URLs or access to test content, please mention it here.
